thread.title: Mrs A Scott
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mrs A Scott

author: Mrs A Scott
title: Mrs A Scott
text: Blinds are excellent quality. I measured the window and they arrived fitting perfectly and simple to fit (I used a 'man that can'. Did not take long to fit. Mechanism is smooth and good quality. I would def recommend this product and use this company again. Excellent value for money.
